content.rendered:
GEOKC Capital Campaign

A capital campaign is a specific time consideration to make fundraising effort through a charity or non-profit organization, until it’s over. GEOKC Capital Campaign is a large scale fundraising plan which is based on the sketch of GEOKC Building Projects with the goal of raising significant fund within a certain time frame. The goal to raising the fund include two solid reasons which are purchase the land and construct the building.

GEOKC Capital Campaign employs all the usual means of raising funds such as direct mail and direct solicitation, fundraising events, pledges, recognition opportunity, major gifts, cash, planned giving, endowment and much more. A well-organized plan of capital campaigns require extraordinary preparation and skillful execution to follow through and this is our main goal.

The building project of GEOKC is ready to begin and exited to proceed with the very first branch of GEOKC which is established in MN several years before. The name of this building project is known as:

GEOKC New Building Project World Fundraising Meet-ups.

Besides Minnesota Meetups, there will be Meetup groups available with different branches and locations of GEOKC.

To join the GEOKC Capital Campaign planning committee in Minnesota, please click on the following link:
GEOKC New Building Project World Fundraising Meet-up

To process the GEOKC Capital Campaign donation please click on the following link:
GEOKC Capital Campaign Donation

This project is especially created to meet the funding goal of GEOKC Capital Campaign worldwide.

You can found a detail explanation of the architecture history and facilities of GEOKC and also the sketch of our time commitment role via clicking on the link below:


GEOKC Building Projects

Capital Campaign Planning Sketch
